remarks: Index shift of the limit of an infinite series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Nov-2013.)
statement:
isershft.1 $e |- F e. _V $.
isershft $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ~~> A <-> seq ( M + N ) ( .+ , ( F shift N ) ) ~~> A ) ) $.
